translations: 改革家；改革运动者；改良者

sentences.sentence: Piaget said: "True adaptation to society comes automatically when the adolescent reformer attempts to put his ideas to work."
sentences.translation: 皮亚杰说：“当青少年改革家试图将他的想法付诸实践时，就自然而然地真正适应这个社会了。”

sentences.sentence: Nevertheless, Gerteis argues, these disparate party affiliations did not diminish the actuality of reformer unity, most prominent in the 1830s.
sentences.translation: 然而，格泰斯认为，这些不同的政党联盟并没有削弱改革者团结的现状，尤其是在19世纪30年代。

sentences.sentence: How could he be a reformer and a defender of established interests at the same time?
sentences.translation: 他怎么可能既是改革者，又是既得利益的维护者呢？
